ValidationRule.description: Ensure the value of either the parent or child bundle level field is None or 1.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(SBQQ__AscendingNestedLevel__c) != null && TEXT(SBQQ__AscendingNestedLevel__c) != '1') || (TEXT(SBQQ__DescendingNestedLevel__c) != null && TEXT(SBQQ__DescendingNestedLevel__c) != '1') || (TEXT(SBQQ__DescendingActionNesting__c) != null && TEXT(SBQQ__DescendingActionNesting__c) != '1')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The maximum supported Bundle Level is 1.
